channel.title: prayer-BH07775 on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in prayer-BH07775 on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer BH07775 in English
item.description: O God, my God! I have turned in repentance unto Thee, and verily Thou art the Pardoner, the Compassionate. O God, my God! I have returned to Thee, and verily Thou art the the Ever-Forgiving, the Gracious. O God, my God! I have clung to the cord of Thy bounty, and with Thee is the storehouse of all that is in heaven and earth. O God, my God! I have hastened toward Thee, and verily Thou art the Forgiver, the Lord of grace abounding.
